text: Rebel Melanie Elizabeth Wilson (born 2 March 1980) is an Australian Producer, Writer, Singer and Actress. Her many movies include Ghost Rider, Pitch Perfect and Bridesmaids. She played Kimberley Boubier in Super Fun Night. Rebel Wilson was born in Sydney, New South Wales. She lives in West Hollywood, California . ==References== 2\. Rebel Wilson's full name is Rebel Melanie Wilson, he is an Australian actress, comedian, writer, producer.
